summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DigiKawsay Phase 7 Observability features. Backend APIs fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend structure in place but login integration has issues preventing full UI testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Login form submission fails or resets, preventing successful authentication in browser

integration_issues.issue: Cannot complete login flow in browser automation, though API login works correctly

passed_tests: Health Check API - GET /api/observability/health (no auth required)
System Metrics API - CPU, memory, disk, connections data
Business Metrics API - users, campaigns, insights counts
Endpoint Metrics API - latency percentiles and error rates
Logs API - structured JSON logs with correlation_id
Prometheus Metrics API - metrics in Prometheus format
Authentication enforcement - proper redirects to login
ObservabilityPage component structure - exists and accessible
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend login form submission issue. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), but browser-based login fails preventing full UI testing. The login API works correctly via curl, suggesting a frontend form handling issue.

success_percentage.frontend: 30% (structure exists, authentication enforced, but login flow broken)
